title: help me my lol doesnt open
body: i click at my lol  and doesnt open , its do nothing

replies.body: The patcher needs permission from your OS settings to launch, otherwise it can fall into a dormant state after clicking the icon.  I recommend going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and allow access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
